channel.title: I cant run any server
channel.description: every single client and source i download doesnt work. when i click run the little black box pops up then goes away really quick. i have jdk 7. i dont know what else to do. can someone help me

item.title: I cant run any server
item.dc:creator: @jwags jwags
item.description:
@jwags wrote:

yea, right click run or runserver (what ever it is) and click edit, now go to my computer on desktop or start menu. windows ©
program files
java
jdk#.#.#_## (use the highest one aka the most updated)
then bin
copy whats in the adress bar, then go to the compile file
and find something that looks similar to what you copied in the address bar, and replace everything that is before the “\javac.exe”, or just find “jdk” and it should be folowed by a number, replace that with what ever your highest jdk is, it should be in the address bar that you found in the other steps above, u have to do this in compile and possibly run, unless they have an automatic use highest java code, but i doubt they do because ur asking for help

Read full topic

item.title: I cant run any server
item.dc:creator: @demps2k9 demps2k9
item.description:
@demps2k9 wrote:

Sometimes you need to set your enviroment variables for your server to work as well as compiling.

When I first started, it did the same to me but I set enviroment variables and it worked fine.

Read full topic
